name: Maria Baby Pet Vet & Little Puppy Doctor - pet salon & kids spa games!
name_original: Maria Baby Pet Vet & Little Puppy Doctor - pet salon & kids spa games!
description:
Do you love pet? Poor Pets of baby maria are so sick ,hurt and dirty, they need doctors help.
Wash cute baby animal, take care of and then give treatment to make them recover.
Cute baby pets like puppy, kitten, Pig pet are injured so take care of them.
Help pet by healing their wounds.
Here is combination of care and doctor game. Be a multi-specialist.
Heal their injuries and play with cute little pet.

Features:

=> Wash different baby pets and give bubbly bath.
=> Cut all extra nails to make them infection free.
=> Use hygienic pet products.
=> Tools like plucker, bandage, injection etc are used.
=> Cat clothes, goggles, cap, shoes are available to dress them up.
